short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove right-click blockers, copy paste blockers, or any blockers you want to remove.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove right-click blockers, copy paste blockers, or any blockers you want to remove.

Block JavaScript events with Purity.
'copy', 'contextmenu', everything.

Or use pre-defined presets.
 - Blocked: block major blockers with event.
 - Nothing: block no events at all.
